snippet: The survey of 1,433 registered voters from Sept. 9 to 13 used random sampling methods to ensure proper representation in terms of region, sex, race and other factors....
lead_paragraph: The survey of 1,433 registered voters from Sept. 9 to 13 used random sampling methods to ensure proper representation in terms of region, sex, race and other factors.

headline.main: How the Times/CBS News Poll Was Conducted
